product_name: CamelBak Antidote Lumbar Reservoir - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: Take the load off your shoulders and carry your water more efficiently on long runs or rides! The CamelBak AntidoteTM 70 oz. Lumbar Reservoir provides reliable hydration while you're on the go.
